page.title: 15To School from Gt.Waldingfd.
page.content: I wake up at 6:45 a.m.I have a shower and eat some breakfast.I catch the school bus at 8:20 a.m.It takes 10 minutes to get there over a distance of 3 miles.The school is called All Saints Middle C of E School.The age of pupils ranges from 9 to 13 years.People come to All Saints from Gt.Waldingfield, Long Melford,Lt.Waldingfield and Sudbury.School starts at 8:45,we get there about 8:30.The day is split into eight periods.Each about 35 minutes long.The typical lessons are Maths, English,Science,Design,Drama,Humanities and Music.Through the school this year we have been to the Science Museum,the Imperial War Museum,Bush Boake Allen's works and the Suffolk coast.I get home at 3:55 p.m. and then do my homework.
